The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Category:Wrist items

From DDO wiki

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Bracers, armbands, manacles etc.

This slot covers all things that would cover your wrists. Essentially bracers and possibly some bracelets. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Black Widow Bracers
  • Armor Bonus +4Armor Bonus +4: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +4 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Blademaster Bracers
  • Dexterity +3 Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 5 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Assault on Splinterskull
Berserker Bracers
  • DRDamage Reduction 1/-: Reduces all physical damage by 1. 1/-
  • Intimidate +3Intimidate +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
 None Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Seal of Shan-To-Kor
Iron Manacles
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Physical Sheltering +11 Physical Sheltering +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 7 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Free Delera End chest
Kundarak Warding Bracers
  • Constitution +5 Constitution +5: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Resistance +4 Resistance +4: Passive: +4 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Magical Sheltering +13 Magical Sheltering +13: +13 Enhancement bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
  • Wards of House KundarakWards of House Kundarak: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +5% Artifact bonus to Armor Class
    +10 Artifact bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
 9 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Plane of Night raid warded chest
Bracers of the Demon's Consort
  • Demonic Curse Demonic Curse: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that your attacker will be Cursed.
  • Demonic Shield Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +30 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.
  • Demonic RetributionDemonic Retribution: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a demonic force will strike back at your attacker hitting them with an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell.
  • Hidden effect: Demonic Drain (1% chance)
  • Combat Mastery +5 Combat Mastery +5: +5 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • The Desert's Starless NightsThe Desert's Starless Nights: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +2% Artifact bonus to Negative and Poison Spellcrit Chance
    +10 Artifact bonus to Negative and Poison Spellpower
    +5% Artifact bonus to Damage vs the Helpless
 11 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Zawabi's Revenge Raid Warded Chest
Tharne's Bracers
  • Tharne's WrathTharne's Wrath: With 2 items equipped - Ghost Touch and -20% Melee Threat. With 3 items equipped - Feather Falling.
  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Armor Bonus +6Armor Bonus +6: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +6 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire A Vision of Destruction End chest
Levik's Bracers
  • Equipment Healing Amplification +40Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +40 (Equipment bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Levik's DefenderLevik's Defender: With 2 items equipped - +3 Insight bonus to AC, 20% Additional Melee Threat, Unlisted Fortitude and Will Save +1 (Stacks with most but not Parrying/Greater Parrying). With 3 items equipped - +5 insight AC, 30% Additional Melee Threat (Threat stacks, but only with non-like amounts)
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Hound of Xoriat Raid Warded Chest
Ventilated Bracers
  • Armor Bonus +6Armor Bonus +6: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +6 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Enhanced Disable Device +3Enhanced Disable Device +3: Passive: +3 Enhancement bonus to the Disable Device skill.
  • Enhanced Open Lock +3Enhanced Open Lock +3: Passive: +3 Enhancement bonus to the Open Lock skill.
  • Air GuardAir Guard: This Weapon stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the user of this weapon is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.
  • Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver)Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Stormreaver to combine it with. Bring this item to the Stormreaver Monument in Gianthold and combine it with a Seal of the Stormreaver to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Reaver's Fate Raid Warded chest
Chaosgarde
  • Required Trait: Lawful (UMD: 20)
  • HeroismHeroism: Passive: +2 morale bonus to all your attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.
  • Chaos GuardChaos Guard: The bearer of this item gains +2 Deflection bonus to AC and +2 Resistance bonus to saving throws from Chaotic Enemies.

Righteous Bracers
  • Undead GuardUndead Guard: This armor burns those Undead that attack the wearer, causing 3d8 Good damage on a successful melee attack.

Epic Bracers of Deftness
  • Feat: MobilityFeat: Mobility: While equipped this armor grants the wielder the Mobility feat: increases the maximum dexterity bonus permitted by armor and tower shields by 2, adds a +4 bonus to Armor Class while tumbling, and gain a 2% dodge bonus.
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.

  • Hide +17Hide +17: Passive: +17 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.

Jidz-Tet'ka
  • Tet-zik, The Enlightened ChangeWhile you are centered, this item grants you a bonus depending on your current monk stance.
    • Kos-zik, The Air-Change+10 Insight bonus to Jump.
    • Riik-zik, The Fire-Change+50 Insight bonus to Healing Amplification.
    • Thok-zik, The Earth-ChangeReinforced Fists: This item surrounds your fists with kinetic energy. Your unarmed damage is boosted by one half die.
    • Sed-zik, The Water-ChangeOn unarmed vorpal: helpless paralysis poison (DC 17 fortitude save negates), then 1 to 6 DEX damage.
  • Armor Bonus +4Armor Bonus +4: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +4 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Will Save +4 Will Save +4: This item gives a +4 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

  • Underwater Action Underwater Action: This item grants the wearer the ability to breathe water as if it were air.

Bete Noir
  • Unholy Blight Unholy Blight
    Caster level: 7
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)

  • Hidden effect: Cursed Level DrainCursed Level Drain: Each time the player equipping this item is hit there is a small chance it will drain 1 level (no save, almost nothing wards).

Combine this item in Visbane's Folly atop Sentinel's Tower in House Deneith Enclave with a Sigil of the Goat, a Sigil of the Lion, and a Sigil of the Dragon to restore its original enchantments.

Fabricator's Bracers
  • Cannith Combat InfusionCannith Combat Infusion: Your ranged and melee attacks have a chance to cause this item to inject a Cannith Combat Infusion into your bloodstream. For the next ten seconds, this will grant a +4 Alchemical bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity, as well as a 5% Alchemical bonus to your chance to doublestrike and a +2 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class.

Bracers of the Glacier
  • Spell Penetration III Spell Penetration III: Passive: +3 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • ArchmagiArchmagi:This item grants the wearer +200 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Fire Shield (Cold)Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

  • Potency +48Potency +48: Passive: +48 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Spell Lore IIISpell Lore III: Passive: All of your spells gain a 3% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Evocation Focus II Evocation Focus II: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC of Evocation spells.
  • Feeds Off MadnessFeeds Off Madness: This item greedily feeds off the aura of madness related to certain Xoriat effects. The more of these its wearer is affected by, the stronger this item will become.
    • Spell Penetration II Spell Penetration II: Passive: +2 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
    • Potency +52Potency +52: Passive: +52 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.

Green Steel Bracers
  • Taint of ShavarathTaint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons can sate their bloodlust on opponents, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed upon the wearer. Perhaps there is a way to cleanse this item...

War Wizard's Bracers
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Spell Penetration III Spell Penetration III: Passive: +3 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Elemental Spell PowerElemental Spell Power: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +50 bonus to your maximum spell points. This stacks with all other bonuses except Elemental Spell Power.
  • Greater Elemental EnergyGreater Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +20 bonus to your maximum hit points. This stacks with all bonuses except for Greater Elemental Energy.
  • Battle ArcanistBattle Arcanist: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.

Bracers of the Sun Soul
  • Wisdom +7 Wisdom +7: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Insightful Constitution +2Insightful Constitution +2: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +2 insight bonus to Constitution.
  • Parrying VIIIParrying VIII: Passive: +4 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +4 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving throws.
  • Way of the Sun SoulWay of the Sun Soul: When all three item from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 artifact bonus to To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.

Knight's Vambraces
  • Doublestrike 3% Doublestrike 3%: Passive: 3% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Exceptional Strength +1Exceptional Strength +1: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Strength.
 15 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Advance to level 15
Brilliant Bracer
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Exceptional Charisma +1Exceptional Charisma +1: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Charisma.
 15 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Advance to level 15

  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: +100% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.

  • Fire Guard VIIIFire Guard VIII: When Hit in Melee: Deals 8 to 32 Fire damage to your attacker.

  • Incite +20 Incite +20: +20% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage
  • Reinforced FistsReinforced Fists: This item surrounds your fists with kinetic energy. Your unarmed damage is boosted by one half die.
  • One of the following:
    • Armor Bonus +8Armor Bonus +8: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +8 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.

Epic Ethereal Bracers
  • Dexterity +11 Dexterity +11: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +11 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Riposte IXRiposte IX: When Missed by an attack: Deals 9 to 36 damage to your attacker. Passive: +5 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +4 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Deadly X Deadly X: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to Melee and Ranged damage.
  • Speed XIVSpeed XIV: Passive: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, +14% enhancement bonus to melee and ranged attack speed.
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Forged Armlets
  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Acid Resistance +30Acid Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.

  • Void Lore +21%Void Lore +21: Passive: Your Negative Energy and Poison spells gain a 21% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Parrying +6Parrying +6: +6 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +6 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Insightful Physical Sheltering +16Insightful Physical Sheltering +16: +16 Insight bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action

    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

    +30 Artifact bonus to Negative, Poison, and Force Spell Power

    +3 Artifact bonus to Intelligence

    +3 Artifact bonus to Spell DCs

Sunken Chains
  • Insightful Seeker +3Insightful Seeker +3: Provides a +3 Insight bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +3 Insight bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Shatter +9Shatter +9: This effect gives a +9 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
  • Stunning +9 Stunning +9: +9 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential.
    • One of the following:
      • Quality Strength +1Quality Strength +1: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +1 quality bonus to Strength.
      • Quality Dexterity +1Quality Dexterity +1: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +1 quality bonus to Dexterity.
      • Quality Intelligence +1Quality Intelligence +1: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +1 quality bonus to Intelligence.

Fiendblood Bracers
  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Deception +8 Deception +8: +8 Enhancement bonus to hit and +12 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • MarksmanshipMarksmanship: This item is enchanted to enhance your skill with ranged weapons. When using ranged weapons you gain +2 to your attack rolls and +1 to your damage.
  • Shrieking BoltShrieking Bolt: This item resonates with sonic energy. On ranged attacks, on an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will punish the target with a blast of sound (10 to 60 sonic damage). A successful Fortitude save (DC 22) reduces this damage by half.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10

    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11

  • Doublestrike 7% Doublestrike 7%: Passive: 7% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Exceptional Strength +1Exceptional Strength +1: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Strength.

Ironclad Armbands
  • Protection +2Protection +2: Passive: +2 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Competence Healing Amplification +8Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +8 (Competence bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Legendary Green Steel Bracers
  • Legendary Taint of ShavarathLegendary Taint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons feed their bloodlust on enemies, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

Devilscale Bracers
  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

    • 5 Pieces Equipped: +1% Artifact bonus to Dodge

Legendary Vambrace of the Summer Court
  • Insightful Seeker +6Insightful Seeker +6: Provides a +6 Insight bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +6 Insight bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Insightful Doublestrike 6%Insightful Doublestrike 6%: Passive: 6% Insight bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Extra SmiteExtra Smite: You have one additional Smite Evil use per rest. You must rest to gain your initial charge.
  • Charisma +13 Charisma +13: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +13 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Eminence of SummerEminence of Summer:
    • 2 Pieces Equipped: +30 Artifact bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
    • 3 Pieces Equipped: +30% Artifact bonus do Fortification Bypass
    • 4 Pieces Equipped: +5 Artifact bonus to your Tactical Abilities
    • 5 Pieces Equipped: +15% Artifact bonus to damage versus the Helpless
    • 6 Pieces Equipped: +15% Artifact bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot
    • 7 Pieces Equipped: +15 Artifact bonus to Melee and Ranged Power

Legendary Green Dragonscale Bracers
  • Power StorePower Store: This item collects and stores magical energy. Any spellcaster can use this energy to partially power their spells. All spells cast while using this item receive an enhancement bonus of -10% to their spell point costs.
  • Insightful Resistance +4Insightful Resistance +4: Passive: +4 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.

Adamantine Bracers
  • Repair Amplification +53Repair Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming repair healing by +53 (Enhancement bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Greater Auto-RepairGreater Auto-Repair: This item has a small percentage chance to cast a Reconstruct spell on you when you take damage.
  • DRDamage Reduction 30/Adamantine: Reduces physical damage by 30, except from Adamantine attacks. 30/Adamantine
  • Maker's TouchMaker's Touch: Casting a Repair spell on yourself or allies leaves a lingering defensive buff that increases the AC and Physical Resistance Rating of your target by +3 for 12 seconds.

  • Raging Strength 3Raging Strength 3: Your Rage abilities grant an additional +3 Strength
  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential.
    • One of the following:
      • Constitution +13 Constitution +13: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +13 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
      • Insightful Constitution +6Insightful Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 insight bonus to Constitution.
      • Quality Constitution +3Quality Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 quality bonus to Constitution.
  • Cannith Combat InfusionCannith Combat Infusion: Your ranged and melee attacks have a chance to cause this item to inject a Cannith Combat Infusion into your bloodstream. For the next ten seconds, this will grant a +4 Alchemical bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity, as well as a 5% Alchemical bonus to your chance to doublestrike and a +2 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class.
  • Incite +126 Incite +126: +126% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage

  • Conduit of the TitansConduit of the Titans: While wearing two pieces from the Conduit of the Titans set, you gain:
    • +3 Artifact bonus to Rune Arm DCs
    • +6% Artifact bonus to Electric, Repair, and Force Spell Critical Chance
    • +30 Artifact bonus to Electric, Repair, and Force Spell Power

  • Insightful Constitution +6Insightful Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 insight bonus to Constitution.
  • Fortification +146%Fortification +146%: +146% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Parrying +6Parrying +6: +6 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +6 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • False Life +51 False Life +51: +51 Enhancement bonus to hit points.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

Legendary Jidz-Tet'ka
  • Armor Bonus +13Armor Bonus +13: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +13 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Exceptional Wisdom +1Exceptional Wisdom +1: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Wisdom.
  • Will Save +12 Will Save +12: This item gives a +12 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.
  • Physical Sheltering +34 Physical Sheltering +34: +34 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Legendary Tet-zik, The Enlightened ChangeWhile you are centered, this item grants you a bonus depending on your current monk stance.
    • Kos-zik, The Air-Change+20 Insight Bonus to Jump and Tumble, +5 Insight Bonus to Sneak Attack dice and damage
    • Riik-zik, The Fire-ChangeGrants Superior Reinforced Fists
    • Thok-zik, The Earth-Change+10 PRR, +5 to critical confirmation rolls
    • Sed-zik, The Water-Change+10 MRR cap, +5 Luck bonus to Attacks and Saves

  • Feat: MobilityFeat: Mobility: While equipped this armor grants the wielder the Mobility feat: increases the maximum dexterity bonus permitted by armor and tower shields by 2, adds a +4 bonus to Armor Class while tumbling, and gain a 2% dodge bonus.

Legendary Bracers of the Demon's Consort
  • Legendary Demonic CurseLegendary Demonic Curse: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that your attacker will be Cursed.
  • Legendary Demonic ShieldLegendary Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +120 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.
  • Utter Disintegration GuardUtter Disintegration Guard: This item has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies that strike you and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.
  • Combat Mastery +11 Combat Mastery +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Hidden effect: Demonic Drain (1% chance)
  • Strength +14 Strength +14: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

Perfected Bracers of the Demon's Consort
  • Legendary Demonic CurseLegendary Demonic Curse: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that your attacker will be Cursed.
  • Legendary Demonic ShieldLegendary Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +120 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.
  • Utter Disintegration GuardUtter Disintegration Guard: This item has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies that strike you and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.
  • Combat Mastery +12 Combat Mastery +12: +12 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Hidden effect: Demonic Drain (1% chance)
  • Strength +14 Strength +14: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • DRDamage Reduction 50/Evil: Reduces physical damage by 50, except from Evil attacks. 50/Evil

Legendary Manacles of Justice
  • High SpiritsHigh Spirits: You are always in good spirits, unbothered by the world around you. You are immune to Exhaustion.
  • Insightful Fortification +74%Insightful Fortification +74%: +74% Insight bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Sheltering +35 Sheltering +35: +35 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings
  • Vitality +47Vitality +47: Passive: +47 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action

    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)

    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

Legendary Wind Howler Bracers
  • Cyclonic BlastCyclonic Blast
    Caster level: 9
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • Greater MarksmanshipGreater Marksmanship: This item is enchanted to enhance your skill with ranged weapons. You gain a +3 Competence Bonus to Ranged Attack and a +2 Competence Bonus to Ranged Damage.
  • Insightful Doubleshot 5%Insightful Doubleshot 5%: Passive: 5% Insight bonus to Doubleshot. (Doubleshot is a chance to score an additional hit with a ranged attack.)
  • Feat: Wind through the TreesFeat: Wind through the Trees: While equipped, this item grants the feat Wind through the Trees.
  • Greater Shrieking BoltGreater Shrieking Bolt: This item resonates with sonic energy. On ranged attacks, on an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will punish the target with a blast of sound (20 to 120 sonic damage).
  • Deception +11 Deception +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to hit and +17 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
